description: Located inside a fully renovated 1800s Zionist Chapel in Forest Hill, Anise Gallery will be open to the public to admire and see our completed space at The Old Chapel. There will be kids arts workshops, an exhibition and artwork sale.

factsheet.heading: Exhibition
paragraphs:
There will be a chance for a sneak peak of our forthcoming exhibition during Open House.
Our annual graduate exhibition, Graduate Showcase 2023; is a group show which brings together a selection of newly graduated London-based contemporary artists. All artwork was selected through assessing the workâ€™s skill, originality, and technique to produce an exhibition highlighting the most exciting, innovative and groundbreaking work created by the 2023 cohort.The show will consist of numerous mediums including painting, sculpture, print work and an installation piece.

factsheet.heading: Kids Activities
paragraphs: We hope to have an array of activities available for kids - these will be selected and run by eight year old Riley as the first of a series of forthcoming exhibitions / events  for children curated by children.

name: Anise Gallery- The Old Chapel
